text:
[redacted_name] awalnya berpikiran jahat dan berpikiran sempit. mertua seperti ini? Tapi menurut pendapatnya saat ini, karakter kakak iparnya adalah Itu lumayan. Song Jingyu biasanya tidak suka meminum minuman manis ini, tapi hari ini dia merasakan manisnya di mulutnya, tapi dia tidak berpikir itu seburuk itu.
Song Chucheng dan [redacted_name] berbicara dengan mereka sebentar. , biarkan mereka istirahat dulu. Setelah naik kereta selama tujuh atau delapan hari, mereka pasti kelelahan Miaomiao mengikuti [redacted_name] kembali ke pintu dan berkata, "Kakak ipar. Tolong berhenti bekerja hari ini dan datanglah ke tempat saya untuk makan malam.
Jangan menolak, aku akan memasak makanan di tempatmu. Nanti seluruh keluarga akan tahu bahwa keluargamu memasak makanan yang enak. [redacted_name] mendengar leluconnya dan mengetahui dengan jelas bahwa apa yang dia katakan itu benar.
trans:
[redacted_name] was originally evil-minded and narrow-minded. This kind of mother-in-law? But in her current opinion, her sister-in-law is actually not too bad. Song Jingyu usually doesn't like to drink this kind of sweet drink, but today she tastes the sweetness in her mouth but doesn't think it was that bad.
Song Chucheng and [redacted_name] talked to them for a while and let them rest. They must be exhausted after travelling on the train for seven or eight days. Miaomiao followed [redacted_name] back to the door and said, "Sister-in-law. Please stop working today and come to my place for dinner".
Don't say no, I will cook food at your place. The whole family will know that your family cooks delicious food. [redacted_name] heard her joke and knew what she said was true.
